reviews.text: What a find! Super hotel, excellent location, friendly and helpful staff, well appointed room and a jolly good breakfast!
reviews.title: Can't wait to go back there

likes.liked: — The room was large and the heating was controlable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Situated on a quiet street but just five minutes walk from the main shopping center. Our room was large, very clean and comfortable. Heating adjustable to our own taste. Kettle etc provided, also iron & ironing board. Extra pillows provided when asked. Smoking and non smoking rooms on different floors.
reviews.title: super location and value, but ill designed sink faucet and drain

likes.liked: — location on very convenient bus room and within walking distance of much
likes.disliked: — very difficult to use sink faucet and drain

reviews.title: BRILL BERLIN HOTEL
reviews.text: Breakfast served at sensible times and of very good quality.
What really makes the hotel though are the staff - everyone, from the person who cleaned our room to the duty manager, was cheerful, extremely helpful and welcoming.
reviews.title: Find somewhere else!

reviews.text: If pressed to find a tiny little fault - it would have been nice to have the fire lit in the lounge, It woud have added to the Christmassy atmosphere and looked good! But what the who - the hotel was certainly warm enough!
reviews.title: Good Hotel, Poor Location for Tourists

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel on August 30th for two nights with our 8 year old doughter.
reviews.title: " I ll be back!"

reviews.text: This hotel is excellent in every way. Location is the best in Berlin because its close to everything , and also safe.Parking available at cost hotel provided, but also in the side streets.Restaurants within walking distance. Staff very polite and helpfull.Breakfast ...
reviews.title: Spacious and overall nice

reviews.text: perfect with great variety.Room was great and spacious and elegant. Stayed at the 718
reviews.title: This was my Second Stay at Tulip and looking forward to my third stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: upgraded from std room.If you travel by your car then this is the best choice.
reviews.title: Good hotel, Awesome location

reviews.text: Definitely would go back, and of course i will recommend it to my clients,since i am a travel agent.
reviews.title: berlin 2011

reviews.text: What I saw when I first entered my room was quite disappointing, especially after a long and grueling trip. The room was quite small and utilitarian with two single beds and very little storage. There is a sliding door that covers either an area with a tiny shower and toilet or an oddly configured sink in the middle of the room. I felt as if I were staying in a college dormitory room that was furnished from IKEA.
reviews.title: Take the good with the bad...

reviews.text: The bed was hard and uncomfortable and was covered only with a top sheet that had a duvet folded up at the bottom. I felt that the bed was never properly made, since I had to spread out the comforter every night. Everyday, when the room was made up, the duvet was refolded and placed at the bottom of the bed. Amenities are few and far between, and the design of the room is modular. With a only a small floating shelf to use as a desk, it was uncomfortable when using the work area for any length of time. In addition, I find the rate of 15 Euros per day to be an excessive amount for Internet service.
reviews.title: A great budget base but a long walk to town

reviews.text: Now to the positive side. After a couple of days at the Golden Tulip, I realized that the staff were friendly and helpful, and it eased the burden of the sparse accommodations. Their attentiveness and courtesy began to win me over and I concentrated less on what was wrong with the hotel. The breakfast buffet, although not included in the room rate, was reasonably priced and pretty good overall. I had dinner at the same restaurant on two occasions, and it provided better than many hotel dinners I have had in the past. The hotel is relatively new and always appeared clean and fresh.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel clean and friendly

reviews.text: The Golden Tulip Berlin would not be my first choice on my next trip to the city, but during a busy convention week, it proved to be adequate. I appreciate the service from the staff and they made my stay more enjoyable.
reviews.title: nice hotel
Great hotel in a handy location!
reviews.text: We stayed during the second week of January. We arrived too early to check in but were able to leave our bags in a secure room and get straight out into the city. We had taken the train from the airport to the zoological gardens stop and it was an easy 15 min walk from there( turn left outside the station past the zoo)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is near to center of the city but it is not worth the money. We arrived at the hotel exhausted from the trip and we found out that we had twin bed instead double that we had booked. The room except the bathroom was very small. Also the bar on the top floor that is advertised and it was a plus for our reservation was closed. The receptionists were not helpful with us, not even to call a taxi. We were calling from our cellphones.The internet was with payment in the 21th century!!!! A total mess!!!!!!
reviews.title: no value for its money!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is in a quiet side street but within easy walking distance of restuarants the Tiergarten and zoo and Ku'damm.
reviews.title: Stylish hotel in a very good yet quiet position.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived in the morning and the staff did their best to ensure that our rooms were ready ASAP and most of our party had their rooms well before the official check in time. The rooms themselves were excellent, stylish, roomy and very well appointed. We had a comfortable sofa and a large desk in addition to the usual furniture. Beds were very comfortable. The bathhroom only had a shower but what a great shower and we are not bothered about a bath. If you want a bath specify a room with a bath when you book.
reviews.title: confortable hotel with good service

reviews.text: One criticism would be the hospitality tray. It had the dreaded "creamer" instead of milk but it was not topped up consistently so sometimes there would only be one sachet of coffee. Others had the same complaint.
reviews.title: Good Hotel in Quiet Location - Short walk from Centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Dinner was not good but the breakfasts were much better with a good choice of hot and cold food and great jam.
reviews.title: Great value

reviews.text: My husband and I were very pleased with our accomodations at the Golden Tulip. Staff in general were very friendly and helpful. You can buy public transportation tickets at the desk which was very convenient. A big plus is the # 100 bus you can catch around the corner which will take you past or close to many of the great sights of Berlin.
reviews.title: A Great Choice!

reviews.text: We stayed in a nonsmoking double superior room which included two twin beds pushed together ( they don't have queen or king size beds). It was very satisfactory. The room also had a desk, TV (you can watch CNN in English), love seat and coffee table. The bathroom was excellent with a sink, toilet and a good shower! The heat and air conditioning can be individually controlled in your room and the room was very quiet.
reviews.title: great location

reviews.text: Breakfast was very good with plenty of selection from cereals, breads, pastries, scrambled eggs, sausages, juices, cheeses and various types of salami etc. The coffee was excellent! Most days we ate the breakfast as a brunch, stopped for coffee and pastry mid-afternoon and then had dinner. It definitely helped us save money!
reviews.title: Good hotel with excellent service
Very Nice Hotel Indeed
reviews.text: We would definitley recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a nice, clean and comfortable hotel. It is not a luxury hotel but had everything we wanted.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only negative experience, which was true throughout Germany, was smoking in the public places in the hotel. This however will change as of January 1st 2008 when all of Germany will go smoke free in public places!!!
reviews.title: Great location and very friendly

likes.liked: — Great location, friendly staff and clean hotel.

reviews.text: i stayed this hotel 2007 christmas with my cousien.it is the second trip in berlin for me.This not much confortable than the
reviews.title: Avarage Hotel,but price ...

reviews.text: first one.Location is good.Reception is so help full.But there is a one thing make me sad.There is a wind noice coming from the door and it is really disturbe you to sleep.
reviews.title: Reasonable

likes.liked: — Quiet and central situation. Easy access to buses.
likes.disliked: — Very small room and bathroom. Certainly not 4-star, hence price/quality ratio negative.

reviews.text: The Golden Tulip Hamburg is situated in a residential area, on a quiet sideroad of the Kurfürstenstrasse in the western part of Berlin. The buses 100 and 200 to the centre of the city (Mitte) have a stop very near the hotel. Walking to the busy Kurfürstendamm and the KaDeWe departmentstore take a 15 minute walk.
reviews.title: Friendly Hotel

reviews.text: We were happy with the situation of the hotel but on the other hand we discovered that the more interesting part of Berlin is in the former East-Berlin, the Mitte district (Unter der Linden boulevard, Brandenburger Tor, Reichstag, Spree river etc), which means that a possible next time we will choose a hotel more close to this much nicer part of the city, where history is more present.
reviews.title: Great Hotel Great Location !

likes.disliked: — small bathroom (door hits you as you sit on the loo)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: About the hotel itself: we already were warned in other comments that the standard rooms are quite small and indeed, they truly are! In our opinion this is not what a 4-star hotel should offer to it's guests. The bathroom, too, is small. Every comfort is present, but there definitely should have been more space and a nice chair to sit and relax. A bit budget-class.
reviews.title: Leave the suitcase at home or get a suite!

likes.disliked: — Small rooms, cold staff, quiet hotel with no buzz, 25mins walk at night from anywhere significant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from an extended weekend at this hotel. Everything worked out well. The hotel is in a quiet street about 15 minutes walk from Zoo station from where all of Berlin is accessible through the Underground, S-Bahn and Bus network. Regional Express trains also use this station and getting to Schonefeld Airport from here is about 35 minutes on this train network (otherwise take the S9 which takes about an hour). The number 100 bus (great for sightseeing) passes just around the corner from the hotel entrance.
reviews.title: Great weekend hotel

reviews.text: The hotel rooms were small but comfortable, even the 'Comfort Rooms' (superior class) had limited space. Bathrooms were large in proportion and well equipped, including a powerful shower in the tub. Breakfast buffet was good with plenty of choice including fruit, cereals, cold meats and cheeses as well as hot dishes such as sausage, bacon and eggs. Bread was fresh daily.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed at the Hamburg for 3 nights in April 2007. Very pleased with everything. Excellent buffet breakfast with hot and cold selections and plenty of choice. Lobby and restaurant smart and a small bar that was very reasonably priced for a hotel.
reviews.title: A great hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I booked a superior twin room for not much extra cost and it was a good size with all the usual facilities. Room and bathroom very clean and smart. Beds comfortable and most importantly, nice and quiet. No noise from other rooms, no noise from air conditioning or bathroom fans and even being on the front the noise from the road was minimal.
reviews.title: A great hotel, spotlessly clean.

likes.disliked: — Shower rather than bath in room.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All of the staff from reception to waiters/ waitresses and maids were friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: A great and welcome surprise

reviews.text: Situated close to the zoo, easy to get to the transport network, shops and resteraunts all near by, nice large rooms, only vice is the cost of Internet €24 per day, hotel staff were great, buffet breakfast was normal for the region, would recommend you have the chef make you an omelet
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: I was stayin at this hotel during my stay of 3D2N@Berlin. I arrive at the hotel happily with the initial service, though i couldnt get into my room immediately, the stafff allow to put my luggage in storage room first. In the evening when i get back, another staffs shift has started, since i forget to ask in the morning, i ask the evening staff to check whether my bookings inclusive of breakfast; he confidently answered YES IT'S INCLUDED, pkease come down to the lobby every morning, to my surprise on the morning i want to check-out my bills shown 2pax bfast for 2days, though i complained about it they still wouldnt care. If i know its not included i wouldnt be having my breakfast in the hotel, so many options available around the place !!! I feel totally scammed about this, if not clear about my questions the staff should re-ask me again, dont just answered YES
reviews.title: Beware!!!

reviews.text: Stayed here for a business trip. The hotel is really nice, good quality rooms and really friendly staff. I didn't get to see much of the city due to work but the hotel is about 10 minute taxi ride (or 30 minute walk) to the Brandenburg Gate and Reichstag building which are well worth a visit. I will definately go back to see more and I would have no hesitation in staying at the Golden Tulip Hotel Hamburg
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: We (my husband, sister in law, mother in law and I) stayed at this wonderful hotel 27th - 30th September 2011.
reviews.title: Wonderful Classy Hotel!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Before writing about the hotel we would like to say a huge 'Thank You' to Sebastian who was on reception during our stay. He was was very helpful and welcoming to our family and made our stay extra special :o)
reviews.title: A quiet but central location
